title: Navigating the Street: A Better Approach to Investing
description: Written by two successful professional investors- this book exposes some of the most misleading elements of the investment industry- explaining how to navigate the misinformation AND produce consistent investment returns.Davis and Shahrestani equip amateur and professional investors alike with the tools to succeed over the long run- by turning some of the industryâ€™s most glaring failings into big opportunities for the thoughtful and rational investor.
author: Guy Davis
